Justify (foaled March 28, 2015) is a retired American Thoroughbred racehorse who is the thirteenth and most recent winner of the American Triple Crown, accomplishing by winning the Kentucky Derby, Preakness Stakes, and Belmont Stakes in 2018.
On September 14, 2018, WinStar Farm announced that Justify would stand at Ashford Stud, the North America branch of Coolmore Stud, although the original ownership group had retained some breeding rights. His stud fee for 2019 will be $150,000.
